message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something truly unique.
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
I understand that $200 is a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to compromise. I can offer you the product for $170. It's a great deal, considering the value it brings.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $170 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay up to $140 for the product. Can you meet me in the middle?

I understand that $170 is still a bit high for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for $155. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll find it's worth the investment.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $155 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay up to $145 for the product. Can you consider that?

I'm willing to make another compromise, but I'm getting close to my minimum price. I can offer you the product for $152.50. It's a fair price, considering the value it brings, and I think you'll be happy with the deal.
I understand you're getting close to your minimum price, but I'm still not comfortable with $152.50. I'm willing to pay up to $142.50 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?

I'm getting close to my minimum price, and I'm willing to make one more compromise. I can offer you the product for $147.50. It's my final offer, and I think it's a fair price considering the value it brings.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $147.50 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay up to $137.50 for the product. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping you can meet me at this price.
